inclusion.criterion: Patient have been carrying HBsAg over 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT was over or equal 2 times ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HBV-DNA level: 104 (log10 copies/ml) with HBeAg(-) patient and 105 (log10 copies/ml) with HBeAg(+) patient
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe liver or/ and renal insufficiency
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Used immunotherapy or corticotherapy for 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
